findings.quote: The US unemployment rate reached 3.5% in December 2024
findings.issue: Incorrect data. Actual rate was 4.1% in December 2024. Source: cnbc.com/2025/01/10/jobs-report-december-2024.html

findings.quote: 6.3% peak during the pandemic in April 2020
findings.issue: Incorrect data. Actual rate was 14.7% in April 2020. Source: bls.gov/opub/ted/2020/unemployment-rate-rises-to-record-high-14-point-7-percent-in-april-2020.htm

findings.quote: The US working-age population (ages 15-64) is approximately 210 million people
findings.issue: Slightly outdated. May 2025 data shows 211.8 million. Source: fred.stlouisfed.org/series/LFWA64TTUSM647S

findings.quote: Labor force participation rate stands at 63.4% as of late 2024
findings.issue: Incorrect data. December 2024 rate was 62.5%. Source: bls.gov/charts/employment-situation/civilian-labor-force-participation-rate.htm

findings.quote: productivity growth measured 2.3% in the third quarter of 2024
findings.issue: Data is for Q2 2024, not Q3. Q3 2024 growth was 2.2%. Source: bls.gov/opub/ted/2024/productivity-up-2-2-percent-in-third-quarter-2024.htm

findings.quote: Stanford study found that remote work increases productivity by 13%
findings.issue: Study was 2015 Ctrip experiment, not 2023. Recent Stanford research shows 10-20% productivity decrease for fully remote. Source: siepr.stanford.edu/publications/working-paper/evolution-working-home

findings.quote: published in the American Economic Review in 2023
findings.issue: No such publication found. The 13% finding was from 2015 Ctrip study. Source: gsb.stanford.edu/faculty-research/working-papers/does-working-home-work-evidence-chinese-experiment

findings.quote: GDP growth is projected at 2.1% for 2025
findings.issue: CBO projects 1.9% for 2025, not 2.1%. Source: cbo.gov/publication/60870

findings.quote: World Bank estimates global GDP growth at 2.9% for the same period
findings.issue: World Bank revised 2025 global growth to 2.3% in June 2025. Source: cnbc.com/2025/06/10/world-bank-cuts-2025-growth-outlook-to-2point3percent-as-trade-tariffs-weigh.html

findings.quote: The S&P 500 closed at 4,750 points on December 15, 2024
findings.issue: Cannot verify. S&P 500 was above 6,000 in Nov 2024; this would be major decline. Source needed for verification.

findings.quote: Bitcoin traded at $42,300 as of the same date
findings.issue: Incorrect data. Bitcoin closed at $93,429 on Dec 31, 2024 and was above $100,000 earlier in December. Source: statmuse.com/money/ask/bitcoin-value-graph-december-2024

findings.quote: Oil prices (WTI crude) averaged $78 per barrel in November 2024
findings.issue: Incorrect data. WTI averaged $69.95 per barrel in November 2024. Source: statista.com/statistics/279941/west-texas-intermediate-wti-crude-oil-price/

findings.quote: natural gas futures traded at $2.85 per MMBtu
findings.issue: November 2024 NYMEX contract expired at $2.32 per MMBtu, not $2.85. Source: eia.gov/naturalgas/weekly/

usage.warning: Could not extract exact usage, using estimates
